module: Module-level comment: This module, named 'Altera_UP_Clock_Edge', rigorously detects rising and falling edges in a specified 'test_clk' signal. It operates synchronously with a master 'clk', resetting with a 'reset' input. Two registers 'cur_test_clk' and 'last_test_clk' persist current and previous states of the 'test_clk' signal, updating at every positive 'clk' edge. A 'found_edge' wire assists in edge detection, differentiating states of 'test_clk'. When a rising/falling edge is detected, the respective 'rising_edge'/'falling_edge' output signal goes high.
